00026 #if !defined OPTICS_H
00027 #define OPTICS_H
00028 
00029 #include <assert.h>
00030 #include <float.h>
00031 #include <stdlib.h>
00032 #include <stdio.h>
00033 
00034 #include "config.h"
00035 #include "parse_args.h"
00036 #include "general/safe.h"
00037 
00038 /*____________________________________________________________________________*/
00039 /* structures */
00040 
00041 /* ordering parameters */
00042 typedef struct {
00043         float eps; /* order: neighbourhood radius */
00044         int minPts; /* order: minimum number of objects in neighbourhood */
00045 } Par;
00046 
00047 /* epsilon neighbour */
00048 typedef struct {
00049         int index; /* point reference = point index */
00050         float dist; /* distance between point i and neighbour j */
00051 } Epsn;
00052 
00053 /* point data */
00054 typedef struct {
00055         int processed; /* flag indicating whether point has been processed */
00056     int index; /* index in the in the input data array */
00057         float coreDist; /* core-distance(i) = distance(i,j=MinPts), otherwsise undefined */
00058         float reachDist; /* reachability-distance(i,j) = max(core-distance(i), distance(i,j)) */
00059         Epsn *epsNeigh; /* epsilon-neighbourhood: list of neighbour points */
00060         int nEpsNeigh; /* epsilon-neighbourhood: number of neighbour points */
00061 } Pt;
00062 
00063 /* optics data */
00064 typedef struct {
00065         Pt *pt; /* points */
00066         int nPt; /* number of points */
00067 } OpticsDat;
00068 
00069 #endif
